pullrequest.title: Add Insert tab to model editor

content.raw:
Now it doesn't crash any more, but there's still another problem:

1. Insert a double pendulum
1. Right click and edit model
1. Don't change anything and save and exit - the model disappears from the 3D scene but the name is on the list, without links or joints
content.html:
Now it doesn't crash any more, but there's still another problem:

  1. Insert a double pendulum
  2. Right click and edit model
  3. Don't change anything and save and exit - the model disappears from the 3D scene but the name is on the list, without links or joints
